CustomField.description: Determines the Show ID (LMS) even on E&E Opportunities by going through the linked Show Occurrence. Updated for Housing opportunities to pull Show ID of related Tradeshow Show Occurrence. Housing opportunities also have some Stage Name's that are less than 4 characters in length, so that logic is being revised to use record type name instead for Housing only.
CustomField.label: Show ID (LMS) - Calculated
